column1: UPGRADE is unlockeded.*See it from the MAIN.*You can start fighting now.*＠**
EQUIP menu is unlocked.*You can choose cats to use in battles.*＠*****
TREASURE is unlocked!!*get treasures to activate Special Skills!*＠******
DICTIONARY unlocked!*You can see*profiles of enemies there.*＠*******
Item Shop unlocked!*You can buy*many useful items there.*＠**
CAT FOOD Shop opend!*Check it from Main!*＠****
Now you can activate God's miracle!*Get the help when you need!*＠***
Now you can invite friends!*Invite friends and get new cat!*＠**
